scripts.build:plugin: npm run build:plugin-specific && npm run build:plugin-all
scripts.build:plugin-specific: npm run build-r -- testPlugin/module-specific && npm run build-r -- testPlugin/module-specific rollup.minify.config.js
scripts.build:plugin-all: npm run build-r -- testPlugin/module-all && npm run build-r -- testPlugin/module-all rollup.minify.config.js
scripts.build:rollup: npm run build:rollup-all && npm run build:rollup-specific && npm run build:rollup-specific-plugin-all
scripts.build:rollup-all: npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/all && npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/all rollup.minify.config.js
scripts.build:rollup-specific: npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/specific && npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/specific rollup.minify.config.js
scripts.build:rollup-specific-plugin-all: npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/specific-plugin-all && npm run build-r -- testApp/rollup/specific-plugin-all rollup.minify.config.js
